comcmput301f16t01.github.carrier.Notifications

Class NotificationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • comcmput301f16t01.github.carrier.Notifications.NotificationController

  • public class NotificationController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller pattern. Allows a view to get information about notifications and/or allows other controllers to set up new notifications.
    See Also:
    RequestController

      • clearAllNotifications

        public void clearAllNotifications(User user)
        Clears all notifications for a user.
        Parameters:
        user - A user is anyone who uses our app. This is who we clear notifications for

      • addNotification

        public Notification addNotification(@NonNull
                                    User userToAlert,
                                    @NonNull
                                    Request relatedRequest)
        Allows the creation of a new notification.
        Parameters:
        userToAlert - The user to send the notification to
        relatedRequest - The request that this notification is about.
        Returns:
        the notification generated by this method

      • markNotificationAsRead

        public void markNotificationAsRead(Notification notification)
        Marks the given notification as read in elastic search.
        Parameters:
        notification - This is a message that is sent to a user

      • markAllAsRead

        public void markAllAsRead(User user)
        Marks all request for user as read, if they are currently unread.
        Parameters:
        user - A user is anyone who uses our app. This is who we will clear notifications for.
